meta.name: Finance Elegant
meta.description: 优雅金融风格，金黑配色，适合高端理财、财富管理

base.container: background-color: #fafafa; color: #333333; font-family: Georgia, 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 1.9; padding: 30px;

header_window.style: background-color: #1a1a1a; border: 1px solid #b8860b; border-radius: 0; padding: 15px 25px; margin-bottom: 30px;

headings.h2: color: #1a1a1a; font-size: 22px; font-weight: normal; margin: 30px 0 15px; padding-bottom: 10px; border-bottom: 2px solid #d4af37;
headings.h3: color: #b8860b; font-size: 18px; font-weight: normal; margin: 25px 0 12px; font-style: italic;
headings.h1: color: #1a1a1a; font-size: 22px; font-weight: normal; margin: 30px 0 15px; padding-bottom: 10px; border-bottom: 2px solid #d4af37;
headings.h4: font-size: 15px; font-weight: bold; margin-bottom: 8px; color: #57606a; margin-top: 20px;

text.code_inline: background-color: #f5f5f5; color: #8b4513; padding: 2px 6px; border-radius: 2px; font-family: 'Courier New', monospace;

blocks.code_block: background-color: #1a1a1a; color: #d4af37; padding: 18px; border-left: 3px solid #d4af37; margin: 20px 0; font-size: 13px;
blocks.quote_tip: background-color: #fffef0; border: 1px solid #d4af37; color: #8b4513; padding: 15px 20px; margin: 20px 0; font-style: italic;
blocks.quote_warning: background-color: #fff5f5; border: 1px solid #cd5c5c; color: #8b0000; padding: 15px 20px; margin: 20px 0;
blocks.quote_note: background-color: #e8f4fd; border-left: 4px solid #0969da; color: #0c3d6a; padding: 12px; margin-bottom: 15px; border-radius: 0 6px 6px 0;
blocks.quote_info: background-color: #def7ff; border-left: 4px solid #58a6ff; color: #0c447a; padding: 12px; margin-bottom: 15px; border-radius: 0 6px 6px 0;
blocks.quote_default: background-color: #f6f8fa; border-left: 4px solid #57606a; color: #57606a; padding: 12px; margin-bottom: 15px; border-radius: 0 6px 6px 0;
blocks.details: background-color: #f6f8fa; border: 1px solid #d0d7de; border-radius: 6px; padding: 12px; margin-bottom: 15px;
blocks.summary: font-weight: bold; cursor: pointer; color: #0969da; margin-bottom: 8px;

media.image_placeholder: background-color: #f5f5f5; border: 1px solid #d4af37; color: #8b4513; padding: 25px; text-align: center; margin: 20px 0; font-style: italic;
media.image: max-width: 100%; height: auto; display: block; margin: 15px 0; border-radius: 4px;

footer.style: margin-top: 50px; padding-top: 20px; border-top: 1px solid #d4af37; text-align: center;

math.inline: background-color: #f6f8fa; padding: 2px 6px; border-radius: 4px; font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-style: italic;
math.block: background-color: #f6f8fa; padding: 15px; border-radius: 6px; text-align: center; margin: 15px 0; overflow-x: auto; font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif;
